title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash, the perfect addition to your home or professional workspace. This desk offers functionality, durability, and a sleek design that will elevate any room.

With dimensions of 59 inches width, this desk provides ample space for all your work essentials. It is constructed with high-quality medium-density fiberboard, ensuring long-lasting durability. The paper laminate finish gives it a clean and modern look, while also making it scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant, perfect for busy work environments.

The Realspace® Magellan Desk features a convenient slide-out keyboard tray, allowing you to save space on the desktop and maintain an organized workspace. It comes with a total of four drawers, including one file drawer and three box drawers, providing plenty of storage options for files, supplies, and personal belongings.

Whether you're using it at home or for professional use, this desk is designed to meet your needs. It complies with ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, guaranteeing its quality and reliability. Please note that due to its weight and size, it may require more than one person to handle during assembly.

The Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk is the ultimate blend of style and functionality. Get yours today and transform your workspace into a productive and organized environment.

In addition to its functionality, this desk is designed to withstand the demands of daily use. It is scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant, ensuring that it maintains its pristine appearance for years to come. 

Assembly is required for this desk, but rest assured, it comes with clear instructions to guide you through the process. Please note that due to its weight and size, it may be advisable to have more than one person to handle the assembly. The desk meets ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, guaranteeing its quality and reliability. 

Don't worry about the hassle of assembly - an in-home assembly service is available for your convenience. Simply contact 866-388-4350 to arrange for professional assistance.
